html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12602022-12-02HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCannabis Act
Food and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Concerning Cannabis Research and Testing and Cannabis Beverages
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS CONCERNING CANNABIS RESEARCH AND TESTING AND CANNABIS BEVERAGES in order to (1) exempt non-therapeutic research on cannabis involving human participants from the clinical trial requirements, where that research is conducted under a cannabis research licence; (2) include appropriate health and safety requirements to protect non-therapeutic research participants; (3) allow analytical testing licence holders and government laboratories to produce, distribute, and sell reference standards and test kits; and (4) broaden the educational qualifications for the head of laboratory position.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0251 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Concerning Cannabis Research and Testing and Cannabis Beverages
